title.title: Section Title
title.helper: Optional. Displays instead of the default page title.

use_background.title: Enable Background and Section Padding
use_background.helper: Enables section padding. When enabled, you can add a custom background using the fields below.

grid_url.title: URL
grid_url.helper: Optional. If provided, clicking on the grid will navigate to the provided url.

grid_clip.title: Match Column Heights
grid_clip.helper: The bottom of the tallest column will be clipped to match the height of the shortest column.

pretitle_image.title: Hero Logo
pretitle_image.helper: Optional. This image will be placed above the title and content.

mobile_fallback_image.helper: If the video does not autoplay on mobile, this image will replace the video as accessible content.

pretitle_image1.title: Hero Logo
pretitle_image1.helper: Optional. This image will be placed above the title and content.

scroll_target.title: Scroll Target ID
scroll_target.helper: A valid uri, css id or class to an existing page element. The first valid match will be used. If a uri is provided, the browser address bar will not update.
